name: Signal Triple Protection Toothpaste
description: Every smile matters; your family's choice to smile is never constrained by oral health problems like cavities, stains and bad breath. Triple protection promised this: 1. TRUSTED CAVITY PROTECTION, trusted formula with fluoride and calcium that provides protection against cavities. 2. FIGHTS STAINS, unique Perlite formula that effectively protects from stains to make your smile look naturally white. 3. FIGHTS BAD BREATH, with a fresh mint flavour for long lasting freshness. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
